title: Fully Renovated 2022! 4Bd/2Ba Single Story Home by Walnut Creek Border
posting_body: ['Fully Renovated in 2022!', '4Bdrm/2Ba Single Story home located by the Concord/Walnut Creek Border; 1849 sqft; 7-minute drive to Pleasant Hill Bart', 'Brand new kitchen including gorgeous new quartz countertops and backsplash, contemporary gray cabinets with gold hardware, large farmhouse sink, new stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven/range, microwave, refrigerator); New luxury water-proof vinyl flooring installed throughout the entire home; Bathrooms have new vanities and fans and are equipped with new Kohler toilets, bathtub and shower fixtures; All windows brand new as of 2022; Master bedroom has a spacious walk-in closet; Fireplace in the family room; Both the interior and exterior of the home have been freshly painted; Washer and Dryer included (or can be removed if you prefer to bring your own); Central Heating and AC; Large backyard with generously sized concrete patio for entertaining and covering for shade; 2 Car Garage; Rent includes yard maintenance; Available now.', 'TERMS:', 'Minimum 1 year lease subject to good credit and rental history.', 'Rent: $4,300/mo.', 'Security Deposit: $6,500', 'Pets: None', 'Smoking:', 'No smoking indoors', 'Tenant responsible for all utilities, including PG&E, water and garbage', 'Location: Concord on the Walnut Creek border close to Treat Blvd.', 'and Oak Grove Rd.', "The home is walking distance to Oak Grove Plaza where Trader Joe’s, Ozora Sushi, Round Table Pizza, Mona's Burgers, and several other restaurants are located.", 'The home is a 7-minute drive to Pleasant Hill BART.', 'Please call or text Erene at', 'show contact info', 'for questions and showing appointments.']
